description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.Xprg8rWeYWlV6NwG]{Stormrunner}

When in stormy conditions, you’re able to gather greater information about your surroundings. Your visibility range in a storm (but not a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.llyS6o5YJKCTqKkG#powerful-storms]{powerful storm}; Core Rulebook 399) is reduced by only half, and you take a –4 penalty to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} checks instead of a –8 penalty. When you succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA#endure-severe-weather]{endure severe weather}, you can move up to your full overland speed and still receive the +2 bonus to Fortitude saves against severe weather. You suffer the forced movement and take damage from a failed @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0#fly]{fly} in dangerous wind conditions only if you fail the check by 10 or more, instead of by 5 or more.

modifiers.name: Eye Of The Storm
modifiers.notes: Your visibility range in a storm (but not a powerful storm; Core Rulebook 399) is reduced by only half, and you take a –4 penalty to Perception checks instead of a –8 penalty.
